targets.query: SELECT sum("count") AS "KO" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation",  "request"
SELECT sum("count") AS "KO" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation" , "request"

SELECT percentile("percentiles50", 50) AS "50%", percentile("percentiles95", 95) AS "95%", percentile("percentiles99", 99) AS "99%", max("max") AS "max", percentile("percentiles75", 75) AS "75%", min("min") AS "min"  FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("active") FROM "gatling.users" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "request" = 'allUsers') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "simulation"

SELECT "Duration", "Duration" / ${duration_median} as "Duration / median(Duration)",  "run"
FROM (
SELECT SUM("e") as "Duration" 
FROM
(SELECT elapsed("count", 1s) as "e" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run")
GROUP BY  "run"
)
SELECT sum("count") AS "OK" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"
SELECT sum("count") AS "KO" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ko' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"
SELECT sum("count") AS "Total" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"

SELECT mean("mean") AS "Mean", mean("mean")  / ${mean_max} AS "Mean / max(Mean)" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT("simulation") FROM 
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$new"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation"),
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$archive"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation")
WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Simulation
list.name: simulation
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT("simulation") FROM 
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$new"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation"),
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$archive"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation")
WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition:
SELECT max("Mean") FROM (
SELECT mean("mean") as "Mean"
   FROM  "autogen"."gatling"
   WHERE "request" = 'allRequests'
         AND "status" = 'ok'
         AND "simulation" =~ /^${simulation:regex}$/
         AND $timeFilter
   GROUP BY "run"
)
list.name: mean_max
list.query:
SELECT max("Mean") FROM (
SELECT mean("mean") as "Mean"
   FROM  "autogen"."gatling"
   WHERE "request" = 'allRequests'
         AND "status" = 'ok'
         AND "simulation" =~ /^${simulation:regex}$/
         AND $timeFilter
   GROUP BY "run"
)

list.definition:

SELECT mean("mean") as "Mean"
   FROM  "autogen"."gatling"
   WHERE "request" = 'allRequests'
         AND "status" = 'ok'
         AND "simulation" =~ /^${simulation:regex}$/
         AND $timeFilter
   GROUP BY "run"

list.query:

SELECT mean("mean") as "Mean"
   FROM  "autogen"."gatling"
   WHERE "request" = 'allRequests'
         AND "status" = 'ok'

list.definition:
SELECT median("Duration") FROM (
SELECT SUM("e") as "Duration" FROM
(SELECT elapsed("count", 1s) as "e" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run")
GROUP BY  "run"
)
list.name: duration_median
list.query:
SELECT median("Duration") FROM (
SELECT SUM("e") as "Duration" FROM
(SELECT elapsed("count", 1s) as "e" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run")
GROUP BY  "run"
)
